Heading: Paper Plate Making Machine
Description: We are a leading manufacturer and global supplier of fully automatic Paper Plate machines. Our Paper plate making machine is designed with advance technologies, which gives this model a compact structure and stable performance. This machine can produce up to 120 disposable paper plates every minute. This machine is self-sufficient with the capacity of performing a chain of functions.
Imgdesc: We are a leading manufacturer and global supplier of fully automatic Paper Plate machines. Our Paper plate making machine is designed with advance technologies, which gives this model a compact structure and stable performance. This machine can produce up to 120 disposable paper plates every minute. This machine is self-sufficient with the capacity of performing a chain of functions.

This series includes automatic paper feeding, heating, temperature controlling, automatic counting, and collection as well. It has integrated the pneumatic and mechanic technologies, which ensures faster working speed, higher safety-performance, safer operation, and easier maintenance than the conventional one
PointsHeadingDesc: Paper Plate Making Machine has been designed using advanced technologies which gives this model a compact structure and stable performance. This machine performs embossing, pasting and drying to create final product. It has integrated the pneumatic and mechanic technologies, which ensures faster working speed, higher safety-performance, safer operation, and easier maintenance than the conventional one..
PointsDescription: Comprehensive Control System with PLC + HMI
ImageDescription: Discover the versatility of our Carton Erecting Machine, an automatic solution specialized in crafting a wide array of paper boxes essential for the food service industry. This machine is ideal for producing various types of cartons including hamburger boxes, children's lunch boxes, French fries boxes, fried chicken boxes, triangular pizza boxes, and more, tailored for the quick-service sector. Equipped with a PLC intelligent control system, the machine ensures precise operations and efficiency, bolstered by a sturdy structure that delivers low noise levels and high operational speed.
